import React, { Component } from 'react'; class ContactUs extends React.Component { state = { name: '', email: '', des: '', send: false, } //handleChange function handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleClick = () => { this.setState({ send: true }) } // reset form handReset = () => { this.form.reset() } render() { return (

Contact Us

Fill In Your Information
this.form = form}>
{this.state.send && }

 ); } } const Credentials = ({ name, email, des }) => { return (
Your Information

Name is: {name}

Email is: {email}

Description is: {des}

) } export default ContactUs;
